channel.title: New Business Models on Eclipse BaSyx
channel.description: Recent content in New Business Models on Eclipse BaSyx

item.title: Enabler For New Business Models
item.description: Industrie 4.0 is about more efficient mass-production processes, and mass-customization, the efficient and inexpensive production of small lot sizes. Industrie 4.0 is also the end-to-end digitalization of manufacturing and enables new business models. The following exemplary Industrie 4.0 business models can be implemented with Eclipse BaSyx. Data BrokeringData produced in manufacturing processes is extremely valuable for equipment manufacturers and other third-party businesses since it enables prediction and optimization of manufacturing processes and product quality.
